labels.label: M2 官網訂單是否到過體驗店

processGroups.comments: 比對 M2 & SAP 客戶發票 email 不同

entry.value: SELECT DISTINCT SAOR.increment_id AS order_id, SAOR.customer_email AS customer_email, AOAEV.value AS col_update_ts, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS processing_dt, SAOR.STATUS AS status FROM amasty_order_attribute_entity AS AOAE LEFT JOIN amasty_order_attribute_entity_varchar AS AOAEV ON AOAE.entity_id = AOAEV.entity_id LEFT JOIN sales_order AS SAOR ON SAOR.entity_id =AOAE.parent_id WHERE AOAE.parent_entity_type = 1 AND AOAEV.attribute_id = 324 AND DATE( AOAEV.value) IS NOT NULL AND SAOR.STATUS in ('processing', 'closed', 'complete') AND SAOR.increment_id IS NOT NULL AND AOAEV.value >= (NOW() + INTERVAL 1 HOUR)

SELECT DISTINCT SAOR.increment_id AS order_id, SAOR.customer_email AS customer_email, AOAEV.value AS col_update_ts, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS processing_dt, SAOR.STATUS AS status FROM amasty_order_attribute_entity AS AOAE LEFT JOIN amasty_order_attribute_entity_varchar AS AOAEV ON AOAE.entity_id = AOAEV.entity_id LEFT JOIN sales_order AS SAOR ON SAOR.entity_id =AOAE.parent_id WHERE AOAE.parent_entity_type = 1 AND AOAEV.attribute_id = 324 AND DATE( AOAEV.value) IS NOT NULL AND SAOR.STATUS in ('processing', 'closed', 'complete') AND SAOR.increment_id IS NOT NULL -- AND AOAEV.value >= (NOW() + INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AND SAOR.increment_id = '230316230105'

processGroups.name: m2_email_chk

entry.value: SELECT id, user_username, user_id, user_name, user_is_active, customer_id, customer_uuid, type, friend_flag, maac_uri, created_at, updated_at, CONVERT_TZ(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'+00:00','+8:00') AS 'processing_dt' FROM mrl_sociallogin_invite WHERE DATE_ADD(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,INTERVAL -2 DAY) <= updated_at

SELECT id, user_username, user_id, user_name, user_is_active, customer_id, customer_uuid, type, friend_flag, maac_uri, created_at, updated_at, CONVERT_TZ(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'+00:00','+8:00') AS 'processing_dt' FROM mrl_sociallogin_invite

SELECT DISTINCT SAOR.increment_id AS order_id, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS processing_dt, SAOR.status AS status, order_been_store.value AS not_been_store, order_update_ds.value AS order_update_ds FROM sales_order SAOR INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN value LIKE '%374%' THEN '已選' ELSE '未選' END AS value, order_attri.parent_id AS entity_id FROM amasty_order_attribute_entity_varchar option_value INNER JOIN amasty_order_attribute_grid_flat order_attri ON option_value.entity_id = order_attri.entity_id WHERE option_value.attribute_id = 300 AND value IS NOT NULL ) AS order_been_store ON SAOR.entity_id = order_been_store.entity_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT value, order_attri.parent_id AS entity_id FROM amasty_order_attribute_entity_varchar option_value INNER JOIN amasty_order_attribute_grid_flat order_attri ON option_value.entity_id = order_attri.entity_id WHERE option_value.attribute_id = 324 AND value IS NOT NULL AND option_value.value >= (DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 8 DAY)) ) AS order_update_ds ON SAOR.entity_id = order_update_ds.entity_id LEFT JOIN mageworx_order_base_device_data d ON SAOR.entity_id = d.order_id WHERE status IN ('processing', 'closed', 'complete') AND area_name IN ('Frontend', 'REST API')

SELECT DISTINCT SAOR.increment_id AS order_id, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS processing_dt, SAOR.status AS status, order_been_store.value AS not_been_store, order_update_ds.value AS order_update_ds FROM sales_order SAOR INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN value LIKE '%374%' THEN '已選' ELSE '未選' END AS value, order_attri.parent_id AS entity_id FROM amasty_order_attribute_entity_varchar option_value INNER JOIN amasty_order_attribute_grid_flat order_attri ON option_value.entity_id = order_attri.entity_id WHERE option_value.attribute_id = 300 AND value IS NOT NULL ) AS order_been_store ON SAOR.entity_id = order_been_store.entity_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT value, order_attri.parent_id AS entity_id FROM amasty_order_attribute_entity_varchar option_value INNER JOIN amasty_order_attribute_grid_flat order_attri ON option_value.entity_id = order_attri.entity_id WHERE option_value.attribute_id = 324 AND value IS NOT NULL -- AND option_value.value >= (NOW() + INTERVAL 8 HOUR) ) AS order_update_ds ON SAOR.entity_id = order_update_ds.entity_id LEFT JOIN mageworx_order_base_device_data d ON SAOR.entity_id = d.order_id WHERE status IN ('processing', 'closed', 'complete') AND area_name IN ('Frontend', 'REST API')

processGroups.comments: FOR 將 SAP 收付款資料、配送資料放回 M2 對照 M2 order entity_id & increment_id

entry.value: SELECT entity_id, increment_id , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM sales_order WHERE status IN ('processing', 'complete','closed') AND created_at >= '2022-02-01'

processGroups.name: m2_order_enity_id_increment_id

entry.value: SELECT o.increment_id, o.status, order_item.sku, order_item.name, order_item.price, order_item.qty_ordered, order_item.row_total AS 'subtotal', order_item.discount_amount, order_item.row_total + IFNULL(order_item.tax_amount,0) + IFNULL(order_item.weee_tax_applied_row_amount,0) + IFNULL(order_item.discount_tax_compensation_amount,0) - IFNULL(order_item.discount_amount,0) AS 'row_total', CONVERT_TZ(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '+00:00', '+08:00') AS 'processing_dt' FROM sales_order o LEFT JOIN sales_order_item order_item ON o.entity_id = order_item.order_id WHERE (o.status = 'processing' OR o.status = 'complete' OR o.status = 'closed') AND order_item.sku IN ('1017957', '1017955', '1017956', '1018006', '1018007') AND o.created_at >= @startDate
